## User Journey

### Scenario 1: Verification Error
```
User scans QR code
    â”‚
    â–¼
QR is invalid/error
    â”‚
    â–¼
Shows error page with red status
    â”‚
    â–¼
User sees "Contact Support" button
    â”‚
    â–¼
User clicks button
    â”‚
    â–¼
Redirected to /contact-support
    â”‚
    â–¼
Sees verification details pre-filled
    â”‚
    â–¼
Chooses contact method (email/phone/LINE)
    â”‚
    â–¼
Contacts support with Serial + Pin
    â”‚
    â–¼
Support team helps resolve issue
```

### Scenario 2: Already Registered Warning
```
User scans QR code
    â”‚
    â–¼
Product already registered
    â”‚
    â–¼
Shows warning page with orange status
    â”‚
    â–¼
User confused, wants to verify
    â”‚
    â–¼
User clicks "Contact Support"
    â”‚
    â–¼
Sees contact options
    â”‚
    â–¼
Contacts support to confirm registration
```

## Technical Implementation

### URL Parameters
```
/contact-support?serial=ABC123&pin=456789&brand=ORG001&lang=th

Parameters:
â”œâ”€â”€ serial  â†’ Serial number from verification
â”œâ”€â”€ pin     â†’ Pin code from verification  
â”œâ”€â”€ brand   â†’ Organization/Brand ID
â””â”€â”€ lang    â†’ UI language (th|en)
```

### Data Flow
```
VerifyView.tsx
    â”‚
    â”‚ (User clicks Contact Support)
    â”‚
    â–¼
Extract from verifyData.scanData:
    â”œâ”€â”€ serial
    â”œâ”€â”€ pin
    â””â”€â”€ orgId
    â”‚
    â”‚ Build URLSearchParams
    â–¼
Navigate to:
    /contact-support?serial=...&pin=...&brand=...&lang=...
    â”‚
    â–¼
Contact Support Page
    â”‚
    â”‚ Parse searchParams
    â–¼
Display:
    â”œâ”€â”€ Verification details
    â”œâ”€â”€ Contact channels
    â””â”€â”€ Important notice
```

## Accessibility Features

âœ… **Semantic HTML**
- Proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3)
- Button vs Link usage (button for actions, links for navigation)

âœ… **Keyboard Navigation**
- All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- Logical tab order

âœ… **Screen Reader Support**
- Descriptive link text
- Icon SVGs with proper paths
- Meaningful button labels

âœ… **Mobile Friendly**
- Click-to-call phone links
- Click-to-email mailto links
- Touch-friendly button sizes (py-3 px-4)

âœ… **Color Contrast**
- Text meets WCAG AA standards
- Icons have sufficient contrast
- Focus states visible

## Performance Metrics

âœ… **Page Load:**
- Server-side rendered (instant first paint)
- No external API calls

âœ… **Bundle Size:**
- Minimal JavaScript
- Shared components from layout

âœ… **SEO:**
